text: We went on board Royal caribbean cruise ship. It's not far from the MRT station so pretty convenient. They have luggage delivery service at the port too. Very good port!
The port security are not making any sense. They can put a ban on bringing food onboard, without any good reason

Marina bay hotel. We went to the top floor for food and drink. They have a minimum spend per person of 30 Singapore dollars. Easy to spend this if you have a meal and drink. Lovely views from the top. No trainers or shorts. Smart casual dress required.
